bibl.title: Some Remarks on O.Frangé 751
bibl.note: Revised text of O. Frangé 751 (= MP3 1587.001; LDAB 220289). Discusses the relationship of the text to other papyrological testimonies of Menandri Sententiae from Egypt, especially O. Mon. Epiphan. 615 (= MP3 1582; LDAB 2454).
bibl.seg: Anastasia Maravela, Some Remarks on O.Frangé 751.

Revised text of O. Frangé 751 (= MP3 1587.001; LDAB 220289). Discusses the relationship of the text to other papyrological testimonies of Menandri Sententiae from Egypt, especially O. Mon. Epiphan. 615 (= MP3 1582; LDAB 2454).
